BACK TO CONTENTS Form, massing, and heritage z Height Strategy: Appropriate height of 115m at the tallest point, which should be located on the eastern side of East Ferry Road. On the western side of East Ferry Road, an appropriate height of 85m at the northern part of the site, with heights stepping down towards the south. Heights should step down toward the edges of the site in response to existing residential and the park. z Protect and enhance the setting of the Maritime Greenwich world heritage site.
